item.title: LeetCode
item.description: LeetCode_每日一题 5.29-468. 验证IP地址 难度：中等 模拟 func validIPAddress(queryIP string) string { if strings.Contains(queryIP, ".") { str := strings.Split(queryIP, ".") if len(str) != 4 { return "Neither" } for _, v := range str { strLen := len(v) num, _ := strconv.Atoi(v) strNum := len(strconv.Itoa(num)) if strLen != strNum || num > 255 || num < 0{ return "Neither" } } return "IPv4" } else { str := strings.Split(queryIP, ":") if len(str) !
